name: The Butler Mastering
tag_list: mastering, cd-mastering, music-mastering, vinyl-mastering, cd-music-mastering, audio-mastering, emastering, online-mastering, online-music-mastering, online-cd-mastering, pro-mastering
overview:
The Butler Mastering is an audio and music mastering studio based in Sydney, Australia.

They have been in operation for over a decade, providing masters internationally for CD, Vinyl & Digital release, along with specialist music for Commercial Radio, TV and Film.

Their lead engineer, Paul Butler Tayar has had a unique technical background. With experience including Design & Acoustic Consultancy for the largest in the Asia Pacific Region, alongside Tracking, Mixing & large scale Live Production for the worldâ€™s biggest names. This, coupled with years of commercial radio experience as a Broadcast Engineer gives Paul a distinct and comprehensive perspective on audio production.

The Butler Mastering has fixed pricing for their CD Mastering services and also offers discounts for unsigned artists.
